newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: Malaysian forex market closed for holiday.
newsitem.headline: Malaysian forex market closed for holiday.

text.p: The Malaysian foreign exchange market is closed on Thursday for a national holiday.
On Wednesday, the ringgit weakened against the dollar as players covered their dollar positions ahead of the holiday.

The market was also nervous over reports that Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad would be taking an unprecedented two-month vacation starting this month, leaving his deputy Anwar Ibrahim to assume the leadership in his absence.
At 1000 GMT, the ringgit was at 2.5125/35 a dollar against 2.5073/80 at close of Kuala Lumpur on Tuesday. .
